author: ekoneil
msg: Two ehnancements to the beehive-toold.xml file:
- add a "nocompile" flag to all of the targets that allows the <apt> task to be run without producing .class files for the .java files

- remove <build-webservices> from ant/beehive-tools.xml and move it to wsm/ant/beehive-wsm-tools.xml so that the next release doesn't include tools for building source files the release itself doesn't support

author: dbertoni
msg: Fix for XERCESC-1555 from Mark Weaver.

author: dbertoni
msg: Fix for XERCESC-1555 from Mark Weaver.

author: jkaputin
msg: Added support for import and include to the initialization
of the Component model (i.e. flattening of top-level
components from modularized WSDL documents into the
properties of the Description component). Now, calling
traversal of any import or include tree.

author: jdillon
msg: Removed margins from welcome page to be consistent with the console.
